channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Musk says Trump top tariff advisor is a ‘moron’. The White House says it won’t interfere: ‘Boys will be boys’
item.description: Wall Street wants clear leadership from the White House. Instead it's getting in-fighting and a response that "boys will be boys."

item.title: IRS acting commissioner is quitting over deal to share immigrants’ tax data with ICE to help with deportation efforts
item.description: Melanie Krause will step down over the new data-sharing document signed by Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent and Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noe...

item.title: Europe’s pharma titans confront von der Leyen with threat to yank $113 billion from EU and relocate to U.S. as Trump plans ’major’ tariffs
item.description: Novo Nordisk and Sanofi were among companies threatening to hasten their exits to the U.S., as Trump promised pharma tariffs were coming 'shortly.'

item.title: Musk, Zuckerberg and Bezos have lost $80 billion of net worth since Trump’s ‘Liberation Day’
item.description: Billionaire backers of President Donald Trump are watching their fortunes tumble as tariffs take a toll on Big Tech.

item.title: How China is trying to ‘tariff-proof’ its economy as the trade war with U.S. heats up
item.description: A weekend editorial in the Communist Party-backed People's Daily described the tariffs as a "strategic opportunity" for China to cement consumption as...

item.title: Kevin O'Leary wants U.S. tariffs on China to go higher. Much higher.
While calling for dialogue, China white paper yields no ground on trade issues
Ten-year Treasury yield spikes as midnight strikes and Trump’s tariffs set in
What are the Fed's alternatives if it decides to intervene
S&P 500 futures erase most losses as China calls for dialogue with the U.S.
